column4: and tell us how ye broke it.

Pirate: Light yer hand controller to play, ye bilge rat!
{Scupperin'} be pleasureful, but\nwe need this trinket!

[Arrf! Arrf!]
Sock me grog-swillin' nose
when ye be willin'
 to set sail!
Th' {wheelbarrel} barely\ntrudged an inch. Let's\noverlaul it! Hit {stop}
So long as a {Plank} is\nhooked up, I'll {roll}!\nThar be some examples behind ye.
Press {Stop} to\nget back to yer experimentin'!
Wallop the [Sea Pup]'s snout\nto weigh anchor
I be the [Jelly] ball!\nI yearn to return [Home]!\n{Hold} me!
Crimp yer car to\nreach yer port of call.
Double-tap th' {trigger} quick\nto call {Neko} to hand
Press the {grip button}\nto hoist th' entire Contraption
Gold! Let's save yer contraption.\n{Seize} th' {Divin' Helm}
Ye can also {Load}, {Share},\nor {Island Hop} here.\nFor now, let's just remove th' {Helm}.
Smack th' salty [Pup]'s nose\nto set sail for th' next island!
Reach behind yer {shoulder}\nto pull out a {plank}.\nLike ye're unsheathin' yer cutlass.
Thar be somethin' {sticky}\nin yer {right ear}.\nTry pullin' it out.
This be called a {Sticky Ball}.\nIt'll stop joints from {floppin'} around.
This be an {Unpowered Wheelbarrel}.\nIt have no {fire} in its belly.
This will wash away th' auto-saves for every island and reset back to the first tutorial. This will not scuttle contraptions saved at the save station. Great for startin' a new game for your mateys!

This will destroy every single file in th' game's data folder. All of yer autosaves, anything saved at th' '[local]' save station, any stored settings files, etc... A factory reset! Th' only file that'll be spared is TwitchCredentials.json.
Please restart th' game\nFor language change to take effect
